name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you for your interest in my apartment, Mr. Trabelsi. I would be happy to discuss the rental price with you. However, before we proceed, may I know how long you are planning to stay in the apartment and if you have any specific requirements that could affect the rental price?

content: Thank you for your flexibility, Mr. Trabelsi. Based on the size of the apartment and the length of your stay, I am willing to offer you a rental price of €800 per month. name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: I understand your interest in negotiating a lower price, Mr. Trabelsi. However, I am sorry to say that I am unable to lower the rental price any further.
